      • tryEat

        public void tryEat​(FeedableObject eater,
                   CoordinateObject eated,
                   GameManager manager)
        Method to make a FeedableObject eat a CoordinateObject This method will act differently for each different couple of Feedable and Coordinate objects This method contains all instanceof necessary to redirect to the specific behavior
        Parameters:
        eater - : FeedableObject to feed
        eated - : CoordinateObject to eat
        manager - : gameManager for board update
